sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>The newly added category field is populated for existing sys_notification records.</description>
        <name>SysNotificationUpdateCategory</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[(function() {
    	// No need to run on Zboot
    	if (pm.isZboot())
        	return;

    	var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_notification');
    	gr.setWorkflow(false);
    	gr.query();

    	while(gr.next()){
    	if (gr.getValue("category") == null) {
          gr.setValue('category', 'c97d83137f4432005f58108c3ffa917a');
          gr.update();
	    }
	}
})();]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-08-10 18:57:10</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>affe0e24535111103106ddeeff7b12a0</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>SysNotificationUpdateCategory</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Notification Providers" source="com.glide.notification.provider">e5887ca03cf1311068bcf327dfe37f57</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_affe0e24535111103106ddeeff7b12a0</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-04-17 14:04:10</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
